name: Beethoven-X fBEETS Staking
description: Supplies fBEETS to [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) for BEETS rewards. Rewards are harvested and staked into BEETS-WFTM pool for more fBEETS for the strategy. In addition, the deposited fBEETS are periodically used for gauge voting to boost all Beethoven-X stable pools that Yearn invests in.

en.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
en.description: Supplies fBEETS to [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) for BEETS rewards. Rewards are harvested and staked into BEETS-WFTM pool for more fBEETS for the strategy. In addition, the deposited fBEETS are periodically used for gauge voting to boost all Beethoven-X stable pools that Yearn invests in.

fr.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
fr.description: Fournit du fBEETS sur [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) pour gagner des récompenses BEETS. Les récompenses sont ensuite récoltées et stakées dans la pool BEETS-WFTM pour gagner plus de fBEETS. De plus, les fBEETS déposés sont périodiquement utilisés pour le vote concernant la jauge pour booster toutes les pools stables de Beethoven-X dans lesquelles Yearn investit.

es.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
es.description: Suministra fBEETS a [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) para obtener recompensas de BEETS. Las recompensas se recolectan y se depositan en el grupo BEETS-WFTM para obtener más fBEETS para la estrategia. Además, los fBEETS depositados se utilizan periódicamente para la votación del indicador para impulsar todos los grupos estables de Beethoven-X en los que invierte Yearn.

de.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
de.description: Supplies fBEETS to [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) for BEETS rewards. Rewards are harvested and staked into BEETS-WFTM pool for more fBEETS for the strategy. In addition, the deposited fBEETS are periodically used for gauge voting to boost all Beethoven-X stable pools that Yearn invests in.

tr.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
tr.description: BEETS ödülleri için [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi)'e fBEETS sağlar. Ödüller toplanır ve strateji için daha fazla fBEETS için BEETS-WFTM havuzuna yatırılır. Ek olarak, yatırılan fBEET'ler, Yearn'in yatırım yaptığı tüm Beethoven-X istikrarlı havuzlarını artırmak için gösterge oylaması için periyodik olarak kullanılır.

vi.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
vi.description: Supplies fBEETS to [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) for BEETS rewards. Rewards are harvested and staked into BEETS-WFTM pool for more fBEETS for the strategy. In addition, the deposited fBEETS are periodically used for gauge voting to boost all Beethoven-X stable pools that Yearn invests in.

zh.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
zh.description: 将 fBEETS 存入 [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) 以赚取 BEETS 奖励。收获 BEETS 后再存入 BEETS-WFTM 池以赚取更多的 fBEETS。此外，存入的 fBEETS 会被定期用来为 Yearn 投资的其他稳定池投票以提升奖励。

hi.name: Beethoven fBEETS Staking
hi.description: [Beethoven-X](https://beets.fi) को BEETS पुरस्कारों के लिए fBEETS की आपूर्ति करता है। रणनीति के लिए अधिक fBEETS के लिए पुरस्कारों को वसूल कियाा जाता है और BEETS-WFTM पूल में दांव पर लगाया जाता है। इसके अलावा, जमा किए गए fBEETS का उपयोग समय-समय पर गेज वोटिंग के लिए उन सभी Beethoven-X स्थिर पूलों को बढ़ावा देने के लिए किया जाता है, जिनमें यर्न निवेश करता है।
